title: Shen Shadow Dashes over to Live

replies.body: DONT PLAY ANY GAMES AFTER THIS PATCH THERE IS A GLITCH THAT MAKES U FREEZE IN CHAMP SELECT AND THEN FREEZE ON THE RECONNECT SCREEN SO 'DONT PLAY'!!!!
thats been happening to me a lot lately too but before the patch update where it doesnt let u pick a champ and just freezes then u get penalty for not choosing champ
I would rather believe kiss someone's ass and get about 8000RP

lol its obviously a scam, you have to be beyond stupid to actually give your phone number and TEXT THEM, even if you get the rp (which i highly doubt) your gonna end up paying 1k+ on mobile bills. DONT DO THIS

you can see that so called 'live chat' on that RP claim website and the conversation is just a repeat of random same sentences. Comments on facebook shows that they are doing this since 13/Sep/2015.OMG,giving everyone 8000RP for about half years,Santa Claus should retire.
That shit has been happening to me too it,it really pisses me off when i get a penalty for riots mistakes {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
This happened to me today {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

yea man i reported it so maybe they will fix it when they see it
but if u wait for a couple minutes the game eventually works again

NO GUYS JUST DO IT
BUT I CANT BECAUSE I CANT PLAY LEAGUE WONT WORK

I very much dislike this new shen, for that new q damage pretty much all of your kits damage reduction has been replaced with either damage or "shiny new downgrades" he is not worth calling a tank now, the W does not last long enough (1.75 sec) to make much of a differance AND IT DOES NOT AFFECT GRAVES AUTOS, the sheild is barely better (like 20 points better even with 3k hp) then the old one but on a perm 10 second cooldown and only activates when your  q reaches you or you hit something with your taunt
lol it does not freeze i played a game must of fixed it

Why UPdate Viable Champs when there are so many that are looked over in the Current Meta? Urgot's Ult needs a Rework like theres no tomorrow, Skarner is so Broken (IN a bad way) he is basically unplayable, and hasn't annie been 4 years old for like 5 years? But most importantly lets give Yorik a model update :)
